entry.title: The forums...
entry.summary: In a discussion about the Bitcoin forum, Douglas Huff suggests killing the DNS entry for forum.bitcoin.org. Jeff Garzik responds by saying that hopefully sirius will do this when the forum is moved to forum.bitcointalk.org. However, Garzik notes that sirius is the only one with the keys to the bitcoin.org DNS, creating a potential obstacle in making the change.
